name: Monster Match (chrom4t1c, boy with the bunny tattoo, Redslash12)
name_original: Monster Match (chrom4t1c, boy with the bunny tattoo, Redslash12)
description:
Drag and drop pieces into the builder on the left, then press "Go" to create your monster. 

Each obstacle can be defeated by a set of parts, try to find out which ones and reach the tree for a well earned reward!

Some obstacles cannot be overcome if your monster contains a certain part, watch out!

Created for the PigSquad 2022 Summer Slow Jams Character Creator Jam by:
Aiden
Soren
Jeke
Charles Haitkin
Thomas McGrath
